Package neuralnetwork.ActivationFunctions

Interface ActivationFunction

All Superinterfaces:
DoubleUnaryOperator, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Sigmoid
public interface ActivationFunction extends DoubleUnaryOperator, Serializable

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    ActivationFunction.AtScalar
    This class encapsulates the value of a function and its derivative at some operand.
    static class 
    ActivationFunction.AtVector
    This class encapsulates the value of a function and its derivative at some operand.

    • ddt

      double ddt(double x)
      The derivative of this function.
      Parameters:
      x - The value at which the derivative is to be calculated.
      Returns:

    • ddt

      default org.jblas.DoubleMatrix ddt(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix vector)
      The derivative of this method applied row wise to a vector.
      Parameters:
      vector - The vector for which the derivative is desired.
      Returns:
      A new vector that is the row wise derivative of the proffered vector.

    • apply

      default double apply(double d)
      The value of this function at val.
      Parameters:
      d - An value in the domain of the function.
      Returns:
      The value of this function at val.

    • apply

      default org.jblas.DoubleMatrix apply(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix vector)
      This method applied row wise to a vector.
      Parameters:
      vector - The vector this method is applied row wise to.
      Returns:
      A new vector where each row is this function applied to the elements of vector.

    • applyi

      default org.jblas.DoubleMatrix applyi(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix vector)
      This method applied row wise in place to a vector.
      Parameters:
      vector - The vector this method is applied row wise to.
      Returns:
      A new vector where each row is this function applied to the elements of vector.

    • at

      default ActivationFunction.AtScalar at(double x)
      The derivative and value of this function at x. This method is provided to allow an implementation that avoids redundant calculations between the derivative and the value.
      Parameters:
      x - The operand.
      Returns:
      The derivative and value of this function at x.

    • at

      default ActivationFunction.AtVector at(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix x)
      The derivative and value of this function at x. This method is provided to allow an implementation that avoids redundant calculations between the derivative and the value.
      Parameters:
      x - The operand.
      Returns:
      The derivative and value of this function at x.

    • ati

      default ActivationFunction.AtVector ati(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix x)
      The derivative and value of this function at x, with the value computed in place. This method is provided to allow an implementation that avoids redundant calculations between the derivative and the value.
      Parameters:
      x - The operand.
      Returns:
      The derivative and value of this function at x.
